text: "What You See Is What You Get" is the first single by duo Stoney & Meatloaf. It was released ahead of the release of the duo's only album Stoney & Meatloaf in 1971. ==Track listing== # "What You See Is What You Get" # "Lady Be Mine" (edit) ==Charts== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" !Chart (1971) !Position |- |} ==References== Category:Meat Loaf songs Category:1971 debut singles Category:Funk rock songs Category:1971 songs
title: What You See Is What You Get (song)
